jasima.core.random.continuous

类 DblSumStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • jasima.core.random.continuous.DblStream
      • jasima.core.random.continuous.DblSumStream
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class DblSumStream
extends DblStream
    Creates a number stream that is the sum of a given set of base streams.
    版本:
    "$Id$"
    作者:
    Torsten Hildebrandt
    另请参阅:

        public void init()
        从类复制的说明: DblStream
        Initializes this stream. This method is supposed to be called once before repeated calls to DblStream.nextDbl() can be made.

        public Pair<java.lang.Double,java.lang.Double> getValueRange()
        从类复制的说明: DblStream

        覆盖:
